description.en: Founders observed fleet operators wasting hours at gas stations. The idea for on-demand fuel delivery was born.
description.fr: Les fondateurs ont observé des flottes perdant des heures en station. L'idée de livraison à la demande est née.

description.en: GoGo launched with a single ADR-certified truck serving 5 pilot customers in Cotonou.
description.fr: GoGo a lancé avec un seul camion certifié ADR au service de 5 clients pilotes à Cotonou.

description.en: The GoGo mobile app launched on iOS and Android, opening service to individual consumers.
description.fr: L'application mobile GoGo a été lancée sur iOS et Android, ouvrant le service aux particuliers.

description.en: Expanded fleet to 15+ trucks. Serving 500+ B2B clients and thousands of individuals.
description.fr: Flotte étendue à plus de 15 camions. Au service de plus de 500 clients B2B et de milliers de particuliers.

team.name: Founder Name
team.bio: Visionary leader with 10+ years in energy logistics.

team.name: Tech Lead
team.bio: Building the technology that powers GoGo.
